article.title: Ball Aerospace and Technologies Receives Contract to Support Air Force Research Laboratory
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force is awarding an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract to Ball Aerospace and Technologies Corporation for a maximum of $12 million. This action will develop methodologies, tools and techniques for producing adaptive, distributed sensing architectures in support of the Air Force Research Laboratory multilayered sensing vision.
